Description: Fragment of a transport amphora, reconstructed from four fragments of the shoulder and body. Large post-firing graffito. Hard, porous, light orange clay, highly micaceous (light and dark); light slip; underside worn and flaking off.
Curator's comments: Possibly from the same vessel as BM GR 2010,5002.28. Analysed by Hans Mommsen.
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 343)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.114, p.115, p.128, p.129, p.225, pl.67)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
